title: In C and I Zone, if entire building is constructed for non-residential use, the requirement of separate access shall not be insisted upon
clause_text: In C and I Zone, if entire building is constructed for non-residential use, the requirement of separate access shall not be insisted upon. Prohibition of Factories in Residential Building in Conforming Zones:

source_pdf.text_snippet: In C and I Zone, if entire building is constructed for non-residential use, the requirement of separate access shall not be insisted upon.
